column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is great! My friend took me here for my 21st birthday
column2: where I had my first strawberry mojito-- delicious. The service was good
column4: and I'm a big fan of tapas
column5: so I would know good tapas when I taste it. I especially loved the goat cheese with marinara sauce and olive oiled bread (which is a must-have at all tapas bars)
column6: the beef steak with blue cheese
column7: and lamb with couscous. I don't suggest getting the croquettas though (ONE WORD: eww). This place can get pretty crowded though
column8: but it wasn't bad when I went there. The bill turned out to be pretty heavy
column9: and I honestly didn't feel like I ate all that much
column10: but that's okay... I had a fabulous time.
